description: This file is a ViewModelFactory implementation for creating instances of NotesViewModel in an Android application. It loads configuration, creates a notes repository, and provides ViewModel instances.

classes.name: NotesViewModelFactory
classes.description: A factory class for creating NotesViewModel instances, implementing ViewModelProvider.Factory, requiring a Context to load configuration.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of NotesViewModel, loading Supabase configuration and initializing the repository.
